ValidationRule.description: The authorization end date must be later than the signing date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( ERAT_MandateAuthorizationEndDate__c )), ERAT_MandateAuthorizationEndDate__c < ERAT_MandateAuthorizationSigningDate__c , FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The authorization end date must be later than the signing date.
